p: I hope you know I've been thinking of you very often! I've been canning & jellying lately. Fri. or Sat. I'll put up the first of our tomatoes. So far I have 46 qts. str. beans & 10 qts. chald, a shelf of jelly, & hope to get a lot of tomatoes now. So far, in figuring skimpily, our garden has netted us $20.00 in groceries! We're beginning to have corn now - & is it good!
Mon., would you time to make Nei a coat & little cap for this winter if I send material & pattern? If not, please say so, won't you?
Isn't a lot of news now. But we're all well & happy & know you three are. Give Amama our love & ask her to write us.
Nei attended his first birthday party yesterday. Deanna Mai Kramer was 1 yr. old! He was so good! And was the youngest one there!!
We send our love in bushel baskets to you & Dad & lots o' love to Amama!
